Text:
function RYU_EP04_17()
    -- .転-3【12月第4週】「その欲望、解放しろ」
    SaveData.Title = "その欲望、解放しろ"

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    -- //BU：アキラ・部屋着・通常
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1061.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Normal "Wow, your body is totally beat up."
部屋着・通常
    「いやー、見事にカラダがボロボロですね」]])

    MSG([[After coming back from the boys’ locker room. Akira watched me change from my uniform into casual clothes and said.
男子部から帰ってきたあと。
    　アキラは制服から私服に着替えるボクの様子を見つめて言った。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1253.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual wear・Surprised "I-Is it really that bad?"
私服・驚き
    「そ、そんなにヒドいかな」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1062.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Serious "Yeah, it’s terrible. You can hide it when you’re dressed, but when you take off your clothes it looks like you’ve been using an unfinished transformation system or something."
部屋着・真剣 「いやヒドいでしょ。服を着てれば誤魔化せますけど、脱いだら未完成の変身システムでも使ったような有様ですよ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1063.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Smiling "MY BODY IS FALLING APART!"
部屋着・笑顔
    「オデノカラダハボドボドダー」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1254.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual wear・Flustered "What are you suddenly saying!?!?"
私服・焦り
    「急に何を言ってるの！？！？」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1064.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Normal "Ah, don’t mind me. It’s a spasm sometimes seen in tokusatsu fans."
部屋着・通常
    「ああ、気にしないでください。特撮オタに時おり見られる発作です」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1065.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Sad "But I’m really worried. You come home every day covered in bruises… what kind of hero are you?"
部屋着・悲しみ
    「でも心配なのは本当ですよ。毎日カラダをアザだらけにして帰ってきて……どこぞのヒーローですか、アナタは」]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1066.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Sad "It’s probably no use saying it, but please don’t overdo it. Seriously, it’s probably no use saying it."
部屋着・悲しみ
    「どうせ言っても無駄ですけど、無茶だけはしないようにお願いしますね。どうせ言っても無駄ですけど」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1255.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Slight smile・Sweat "You don’t have to say it twice..."
苦笑・汗
    「二回言わなくても……」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1067.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Serious "Do you listen the first time? You don’t even listen the second time."
部屋着・真剣
    「一回で言うこと聞くんですか？　二回でも聞かないくせに」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1256.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual wear・Sad "I-I'm sorry... But Uran-san is pushing herself to the point of collapsing too."
私服・悲しみ
    「ご、ごめんなさい……でもね、ウランさんだって倒れちゃうくらいがんばってくれているから」]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1257.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual wear・Sad "I guess I have to take some risks too."
私服・悲しみ
    「ボクも少しくらいの無茶はしないといけないな、って」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1068.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Sad "Generally speaking, being covered in bruises all over your body wouldn’t be called ‘taking some risks’."
部屋着・悲しみ
    「一般的には、全身がアザだらけの惨状を『少しくらいの無茶』とは言いませんけどね」]])

    MSG([[Still, Akira didn’t say more and backed off.
なんて言いつつも、アキラはそれ以上言わずに引き下がってくれる。]])

    MSG([[She knows full well that I won’t listen, but still says it.
ボクが言っても聞かないことを承知で言ってくれているんだよね。]])

    MSG([[I really feel sorry. But even so, I have to keep trying.
本当に申し訳ない。
    　ただそれでも、がんばらないといけないから。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1069.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Normal "By the way, that Uran person—her tendency to ignore herself, overdo things, and her yandere side, somehow she’s similar to you, Minachin."
部屋着・通常 「それにしてもそのウランってヒト、自分を顧みないところとか、無茶し過ぎるところとか、ヤンデレなところとか、何だかミナちんと似てますよね」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1258.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual wear・Flustered "Y-Yandere!? What are you suddenly saying!"
私服・焦り
    「や、ヤンデレ！？　何を言い出しているの、急に！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1070.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Nervous smile・Sweat "She’s unaware of it herself. Sneaking into the academy in disguise as a girl for her sister—if you put it positively it’s devotion, but negatively, that’s yandere."
部屋着・苦笑・汗 「本人は無自覚なんですよねえ。姉のために女装で学園に潜入なんてできるのは、よく言えば一途、悪く言えばヤンデレでしょうに」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1071.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Grin "Maybe that’s why you two are drawn to each other? Yandere types attract one another, you know."
部屋着・ニヤリ
    「でもだからこそアナタたち、惹かれ合っているんじゃないですか？　ヤンデレ同士は惹かれ合うんですなぁ」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1259.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual wear・Nervous smile・Sweat "Don’t say it like it’s some Stand user ability."
私服・苦笑・汗
    「スタンド使いみたいに言わないでよ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1072.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Normal "Anyway, setting that aside. Don’t you, Minachin and Uran-san, have any desires? When things get really tough, desire is what supports you first."
部屋着・通常 「まぁ余談はともかく。ミナちんもウランさんも、欲とかないんです？　本当にツラい時、まず支えになるのは欲望でしょう」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1260.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual wear・Normal "D-Desire? If I talk about my desire, it’s just to wake up Marika-nee-san."
私服・通常
    「よ、欲望？　ボクの欲望って言えば、マリカ姉さんを目覚めさせることだけど」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1073.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Nervous smile・Sweat "Doing something for someone else is different... More like, let’s release a desire that’s totally for yourself—like a totally selfish hobby thing."
部屋着・苦笑・汗 「他の誰かのために行うのは何か違うんですよねー……もっとこう、趣味丸出しと言うか、自分のためだけの欲望を解放させましょうよ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1074.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Serious "Wanting to be popular with girls. Wanting to play games all day. Wanting to beat Pikakin in subscriber count. Don’t you have something like that?"
部屋着・真剣 「女の子にモテたいとか。一日中ゲームだけしてたいとか。チャンネル登録者数でピカキンに勝ちたいとか。そういうのないんです？」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1261.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual wear・Nervous smile・Sweat "H-Hmm... Ah, maybe I want a dishwasher. One with a drying function."
私服・苦笑・汗
    「う、うーん……あ、食器洗浄機が欲しいかも。乾燥機能がついているヤツ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1075.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Nervous smile・Sweat "Are you a mom? You should be looking for something more like a male student... geez."
部屋着・苦笑・汗
    「子持ちの主婦ですか、アナタは。もっと男子学生らしいのを求めているのに……まったく」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1076.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Casual wear・Normal "Well, it might not come to you right away, but think about it again. Minachin should live more for yourself."
部屋着・通常
    「まぁすぐには見つからないかもですけど、また考えてみてください。ミナちんはもっと、自分のための人生を送るべきなんですから」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1262.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual wear・Normal "My desires, huh."
私服・通常
    「ボクの欲望、か」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[It seems unlikely to find them easily.
簡単には見つかりそうにない。]])

    MSG([[Thinking it over, I realized that until now, my life was all about chasing after Marika-nee-san. I had never thought about any other desires.
よくよく考えてみると、ボクのこれまでの人生はマリカ姉さんを追いかけるばかりで、それ以外の欲望なんて考えたことがなかった。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1263.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual wear・Normal (If it were Uran-san… I wonder what she would say.)
私服・通常
    （ウランさんだったら……一体なんて答えるかな）]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[If it’s someone like Uran-san who’s similar to me, what would her answer be? I thought maybe I’d ask if I get the chance.
自分と似たウランさんならなんと答えるだろうか。
    　また機会があれば聞いてみようと思った。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP04_18")
end
